bio:
Hi! My name is Sanjesh. Welcome to my Profile.

I'm a Certified BE Degree Graphic designer with more than 3+ years of experience in the field.
I’ve been working with corporate companies for as long as I remember and learned that customer satisfaction is key for success.
I can make your company look it's best ! Guaranteed

I’m an expert in:
- Branding
- Corporate Identity (Logo, Business cards, Letter Heads, Envelopes, promotional items etc..)
- Social Media ads designs
- Brochures
- Media Kits
- Email Template Design
- Packaging Design
- Printed Materials
- Flyer Design
- Website Design (UI/UX)
- Wordpress Design and Development
- Psd to html, bootstrap Design
- Android and iOS Apps
- Magento Services
- React Native and React JS
- PHP and Frameworks(laravel etc)
- Magento Projects
- Shopify Projects
- Ecommerce and Business  Websites SEO
and much more.

I’m ready to listen carefully to your requests, understand the style and what’s the message behind the design as well as suggest ideas where I see fit until we come up with the best result.

I’ll make sure your projects stand out; you’ll be sure it will grow your business.

Thanks
Sanjesh kumar Raheja

I prefer Safepay.

For the projects valued under or equal to 1500-2000USD;

25% advance on signing of contract
75% on final delivery

For projects above 2500USD;

a) 20% as project advance,
b) 30% on approval of design
c) 25% on milestones completion,
c) 25% (remaining) final payment on project completion and handing over site to clients possesion with QC and full testing

abstrac: Lightning-fast and unbelievably meticulous designer & translator
bio:
If you’re looking for a reliable partner that will first take the time to understand your business and needs and then based on his expertise will help you to create a strong connection point, through visuals and well-crafted localized messages, between your company and your clients or potential clients, then I’m your man.

I have been doing Graphics and Translation work for almost 8 years. I have touched on everything from brochures, flyers, event posters, t-shirts, book covers, presentations, business cards, logos, typography, packaging, photo editing, designs for social media platforms, etc. Please check out my online portfolio on Behance https://www.behance.net/paolo_17383a47 to see some of the work I've done for clients. As far as translation work is concerned, I have translated website content, contracts, product descriptions, brochures, technical manuals, books, software strings, and more. I work with a team and provide multilingual solutions in Spanish, English, French, German, and Italian. 

I have the perfect mix of strong writing and design skills, creative input, work ethic and adherence to schedule to help you create or enhance a powerful brand image or message. 

Hire me and let the creativity begin!
When you work with me, you will always get a fixed price so you are absolutely certain what to expect upfront!

bio:
I completed a Graphic Design Bachelor's degree at Full Sail University. The training covered everything from general design, logo creation and branding, print, audio, and video editing as well as web design. While photo and image manipulation are my strengths, I feel confident working in all of these fields and totally enjoy the process of creation in any area.  I believe design creation is about problem-solving, target market focus, and really, truly listening to the client. It’s not about superfluous filters and making something pretty, but market research and developing the proper concept. View my Behance Portfolio here - https://www.behance.net/themescape 

When I'm not designing I breed and show long hair Dachshunds in the US and Canada.
Monday-Friday 8-4 Pacific Time

Freelance Translator with more than 15 years experience in Virtual Assistance, I work in French, Arabic and English.

commnet: Monna had a really tough transcript to do as some of ours have been. She kept working through it and pointed out to me when she had formatting issues. Monna would be a plus to any team!
Monna has been helpful. I appreciate her help.
